Detailed Description

This section defines the data structures used by the driver to provide hardware information, modification and dynamic operation of the driver. These data structures are defined in the header file of the core driver and utilized by the API.

Typedef Documentation

typedef void(* LPDDR4_CtlCallback) (const LPDDR4_PrivateData *pD, LPDDR4_CtlInterrupt ctlInterrupt, uint8_t chipSelect)

Reports interrupts received by the controller. Params: pD - driver state info specific to this instance. ctlInterrupt - Interrupt raised chipSelect - Chip for which interrupt raised

typedef void(* LPDDR4_InfoCallback) (const LPDDR4_PrivateData *pD, LPDDR4_InfoType infoType)

Reports informations and warnings that need to be communicated. Params: pD - driver state info specific to this instance. infoType - Type of information.

typedef void(* LPDDR4_PhyIndepCallback) (const LPDDR4_PrivateData *pD, LPDDR4_PhyIndepInterrupt phyIndepInterrupt, uint8_t chipSelect)

Reports interrupts received by the PHY Independent Module. Params: privateData - driver state info specific to this instance. phyIndepInterrupt - Interrupt raised chipSelect - Chip for which interrupt raised

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum LPDDR4_CtlFspNum

Controller Frequency Set Point number

enum LPDDR4_CtlInterrupt

Controller status or error interrupts.

enum LPDDR4_DbiMode

Data Byte Inversion mode setting

enum LPDDR4_EccEnable

ECC Control parameter setting

enum LPDDR4_InfoType

List of informations and warnings from driver.

enum LPDDR4_LpiWakeUpParam

Low power interface wake up timing parameters

enum LPDDR4_PhyIndepInterrupt

PHY Independent Module status or error interrupts.

enum LPDDR4_ReducMode

Half Datapath mode setting

enum LPDDR4_RegBlock

This is used to indicate whether the Controller, PHY, or PHY Independent module is addressed.
